name: Readings in Latin American Short Fiction
title: WCAS SPANISH 348-0-1 Readings in Latin American Short Fiction
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.

Students must have completed SPANISH 250-0, 251-0, 260-0 or 261-0 to register for this class.
